entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
